description.@en: With but a touch, you imbue a weapon with vengeful wrath.

data.distance: Any one weapon you can touch

criticalFailure.@en: Your invocation has angered the gods. In fact, on the next attack you suffer from a melee or ranged weapon you must ignore your armorâ€™s modifier to Damage Threshold. In addition, it is treated as if it had the Vicious Quality, until it is expended afterwards.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above and the person may add the Vicious Quality to their weapon until it is expended afterwards.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, a weapon you touch is given the gift of wrath. A foe who is struck by this weapon ignores any modifier to their Damage Threshold when considering Damage. This Magick is then immediately expended afterwards.

reagents.@en: A whetstone used to sharpen a weapon (expended)
